attributes.action: Cold calling :( Reclaim your phoneline back.
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone has suffered it , the continued calls from people offering goods for sale or to claim your PPI claimback , even worse the automated calls asking you to call  them or the continued picking up the phone and it to be cut off due to a random number dialer ringing you . Had enough ?? Want to reclaim your landline back , want pushy sales pitches to stop on your mobile .

People all over the country now won't answer there phones and I believe this has to end !. I put forward anyone offering there services or sales pitch should not be allowed to ring your phone unless you have contacted them first expressing an interest in there services . I believe the government should bring this harrassment to an end as the TPS does not stop the practise of random number dialers .
